p: Based on the outstanding results showed by Isolate 1 ( P. aeruginosa CP43328.1) during screening methods, Kirby-Bauer method was used to evaluate its susceptibility patterns using different antibiotics. The isolate was resistant to clindamycin, ertapenem, cephalothin, penicillin G, kanamycin and amoxicillin but sensitive to imipenem, meropenem and gentamycin (TableÂ 4).
